titleInfo.title: Correspondence between Sir James Outram and others concerning the award of medals to members of the Persian Expeditionary Force

physicalDescription.extent: The contents of the file have been arranged chronologically, with enclosures to letters placed directly behind the correspondence they have been enclosed with.

mods.abstract: Printed and manuscript copies of correspondence from Sir James Outram, with supporting letters from other individuals regarding the award of medals to members of the Persian Expeditionary Force.The printed correspondence also includes the names of, and citations for, those men that Outram had recommended for the Victoria Cross.
